subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz hit his second home run of the game — a two-run drive that barely cleared the low right-field wall at Fenway Park — in the bottom of the ninth inning last night to give the Boston Red Sox a 5-4 victory against the Tampa Bay Devil Rays.
